name: View
description: The View class represents a view in a Revit project.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: Gets or sets the name of the view.

properties.name: Title
properties.description: Gets the title of the view.

properties.name: Scale
properties.description: Gets or sets the scale of the view.

properties.name: DetailLevel
properties.description: Gets or sets the detail level of the view.

properties.name: DisplayStyle
properties.description: Gets or sets the display style of the view.

properties.name: Document
properties.description: Gets the document of the view.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: Gets the ElementId of the view.

properties.name: IsTemplate
properties.description: Gets whether the view is a template.

methods.name: SetCategoryHidden(ElementId, Boolean)
methods.description: Sets whether a category is hidden in the view.

methods.name: SetDetailLevel(ViewDetailLevel)
methods.description: Sets the detail level of the view.

methods.name: SetScale(Integer)
methods.description: Sets the scale of the view.

methods.name: GetCategoryHidden(ElementId)
methods.description: Gets whether a category is hidden in the view.

methods.name: GetDependentViewIds()
methods.description: Gets the IDs of dependent views.
